params.name: share_cross_modal_transformer_layers
params.description: Whether cross modal transformer layers are shared.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder and pooler.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: initializer_factor
params.description: A factor for initializing all weight matrices (should be kept to 1, used internally for initializationtesting).

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: share_link_tower_layers
params.description: Whether the bride/link tower layers are shared.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: tie_word_embeddings
params.description: Whether to tie input and output embeddings.

params.name: init_layernorm_from_vision_encoder
params.description: Whether to init LayerNorm from the vision encoder.

params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize BridgeTowerTextConfig.

params.name: vision_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize BridgeTowerVisionConfig.
